description: Make a delicious dinner the whole family will love with this easy lemon pepper chicken recipe. It's ready in 30 minutes and you only need four ingredients.
keywords: Chicken dishes,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,Soy free,Quick & easy lunch,Chicken,Dinner Made Easy,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Easy Lemon Pepper Chicken With Salad & Chips Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g Birds Eye golden crunch straight cut chips
500g Woolworths COOK lemon & pepper chicken breast steaks

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 240°C/220°C fan-forced. Line a baking tray with baking paper, then place in oven.
Place chips, in a single layer, on tray. Bake for 20 minutes or until golden.
Meanwhile, heat 2 tbs extra virgin olive oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook chicken, turning, for 8 minutes or until cooked through. Season.
Serve chicken with chips, salad and sauce.
